emails.subject: RES: Demo account
emails.to: Guillaume Goudy; Joao Pedro De Oliveira Baptistini Lopes; Michelle Sanches Menta; Alexandre Koszutski Vasconcelos
emails.cc: Saber Khalfallah; Support Dnext; Lucas Rosa
emails.body_text:
Hi Guillaume, 

Thanks for your message. We’ve explored the platform, and the experience was satisfactory. 

We are also in touch with other products and consultancy companies, testing and analyzing them. 
Would it be possible to send us a commercial proposal?

Thanks in advance.

Rgrds,
Luca Artiolli



 

De: Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> 
Enviada em: quinta-feira, 18 de setembro de 2025 13:56
Para: Joao Pedro De Oliveira Baptistini Lopes <joao.lopes@novaagri.com.br>; Luca Artiolli de Marco Mauro <luca.artiolli@novaagri.com.br>; Michelle Sanches Menta <Michelle.menta@novaagri.com.br>
Cc: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Lucas Rosa <lucas.rosa@dnext.io>
Assunto: RE: Demo account

 

Dear all,

 

I hope you are well. I was wondering if you had any questions following the demo/trial account. It is finishing today and wanted to check with you the next steps.

Thank you

Best Regards,

Guillaume

 

From: Guillaume Goudy 
Sent: Thursday, 11 September 2025 17:50
To: joao.lopes@novaagri.com.br <mailto:joao.lopes@novaagri.com.br> ; luca.artiolli@novaagri.com.br <mailto:luca.artiolli@novaagri.com.br> ; Michelle.menta@novaagri.com.br <mailto:Michelle.menta@novaagri.com.br> 
Cc: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: Demo account

 

Dear three,

 

Thank you for your time and allowing us to introduce you to Dnext and our services. 

You should receive your access to the demo account tonight or tomorrow. Saber on cc will send you all necessary details. Do not hesitate to reach out to him or me if you have any questions.

We look forward to receiving your feedback.

Best Regards,

Guillaume

Hi Guillaume,

Thanks for your message. We’ve explored the platform, and the experience was satisfactory.

We are also in touch with other products and consultancy companies, testing and analyzing them.
Would it be possible to send us a commercial proposal?

Thanks in advance.

Rgrds,
Luca Artiolli
